text:
e="preserve">Guy Lutgen (19 April 1936 – 26 July 2020) was a Belgian politician. He was a member of Christian Social Party. He was the Minister of Agriculture from 1988 to 1999. He was a Senator between 1977 to 1995. Lutgen was Mayor of Bastogne (1976–2000).
Lutgen died on 26 July 2020, aged 84.
